AllMusic Review:
Merl Saunders makes his solo piano mark. Combining standards like "Misty," "As Time Goes By," "Feelings," and others with his original tunes, Merl has produced a work strong on melody and harmony, yet spiced with imagination. Meridien Dreams is a beautiful and shimmering recording
